sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_entitlement.SKUMetadataSchemaDAO</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Contains queries to sku_metadata_schema table.</description>
        <name>SKUMetadataSchemaDAO</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var SKUMetadataSchemaDAO = Class.create();
SKUMetadataSchemaDAO.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},

    fetchSKUMetadataColumnNames: function(skuMetaDataType) {

        const gr = new GlideRecord(LicensingEngineDBConstants.SKU_METADATA_SCHEMA);
        gr.addQuery(LicensingEngineDBConstants.TYPE, skuMetaDataType);
        gr.query();
        if (gr.next())
            return gr.getValue(LicensingEngineDBConstants.COLUMN_NAMES);

        return "";
    },

    type: 'SKUMetadataSchemaDAO'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-05-15 14:11:27</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>8ff6fc0e43722110b4a1c083a9b8f25a</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>SKUMetadataSchemaDAO</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Licensing Engine" source="sn_entitlement">bcadabf277f311109c62f5f3cb5a992a</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Licensing Engine">bcadabf277f311109c62f5f3cb5a992a</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_8ff6fc0e43722110b4a1c083a9b8f25a</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-05-23 14:37:32</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
